content.p: The Council shall appoint a Registrar who shall act as Secretary to the Council. New version of Statutes approved by the Privy Council - 21 July 2010 Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
